üìñ Human Reproduction Chapter: Complete NEET 2026 Guide with Notes & PYQs

Master Human Reproduction for NEET 2026 with comprehensive notes on gametogenesis, fertilization, pregnancy, and embryonic development. Includes NCERT diagrams, PYQ analysis, and expert tips.

Here are the key takeaways for NEET aspirants:

1. Human Reproduction contributes 4-6 questions in NEET annually - one of the highest from Unit 9
2. Spermatogenesis produces 4 sperms from one spermatogonium; Oogenesis produces only 1 ovum
3. Fertilization occurs in the ampullary-isthmic junction of the fallopian tube
4. Implantation happens 7 days after fertilization in the endometrium
5. hCG hormone in urine forms the basis of pregnancy tests
6. Parturition is triggered by oxytocin from the posterior pituitary
